post.description: Make a check deposit on a user's account
It allows to reset the password
to validate the in of existing user
to validate if pin entered by new user follows pin rules

securityQuestions.Q: What is the name of the Grade School that you attended?

notificationType.description: it can be either email or mobile or both

meta.description: either amount & type or noOfDays or country is required in meta

description.description: Loans/Mortgage Payment for loan payments, for internal transfer transaction type and payment type do not exist

PaymentType.description: it can be minimum or monthly or additional principal payment

transferRequest.description: transaction and payment type is for loan payments

message.example: Unable to find my routing number.

chatHistory.example: html formatted message sent as string

cardStatus.description: This can be any of these active, frozen, expired or blocked

expDate.description: It will be a number format lets say expiry is Dec2021, 1221 will be its value.

fdType.description: idfc specific can be short term,  re-investment, quarterly payout, monthly. payout.

GetTransactionsReq_transactionAmount.description: here amount can be a number or object based on user utterance with same key 'amount'

value.description: it is an array of arrays for MCC

reasonCode.description: CHRG-AMNT-MORE - expectedAmount, CHRG-MULTPLE-TIME - duplicateTxnId, CANCL-PURCH & CANCL-REC-CHRG - cancelledAt CANCl-RECV-GD-SERV - purchasedAt & cancelledAt, INDESC-GD-SERV - customerDescription, UIDENTF-CHRG - NA  codes requires the corresponding fields mapped to it

MCCCode.description: it can also be an object MCC  { $gte - 1520 , $lte - 1799

locateProfileRequest.description: ssNumber, ssnShort, accountNumber are custom types. Either customerId or ssNumber or ssnShort and accountNumber will be sent in the request.
